Preconditions: Customer app available; restaurant menu has at least 1 available item
Steps:
1) Open Menu
2) Select a category
3) Open an item
4) Tap Add to cart
5) Open Cart
Expected: Item is added to cart with correct name, price, and quantity defaults

Description: Select a valid future pickup slot
Preconditions: Cart has at least 1 item; restaurant business hours configured; future slots exist
Steps: 1) From Cart tap Checkout\n2) Open Pickup Time selection\n3) Select a future slot
Expected: Selected slot is accepted; UI shows selected slot; cannot select past slot

Preconditions: Selected pickup slot; required fields provided
Steps: 1) On Checkout confirm Pay-at-counter\n2) Enter phone/name if required\n3) Tap Place order
Expected: Order is created with status PLACED; confirmation shows Order ID + pickup time + Pay-at-counter message

Preconditions: A new order exists with status PLACED; cashier account available
Steps:
1) Open Cashier Dashboard
2) Open Orders tab 'Placed'
3) Open order details
4) Tap Confirm
Expected: Order status becomes CONFIRMED; customer tracking shows CONFIRMED; audit/status history recorded

Description: Customer cancels order while status = PLACED
Steps: 1) Open Order tracking\n2) Tap Cancel order\n3) Confirm cancellation
Expected: Order becomes CANCELLED; cancellation reason captured if required; Cancel button no longer available

Steps: 1) Open Order tracking\n2) Check Cancel button behavior
Expected: Cancel action is disabled/hidden and user sees explanation (allowed only at PLACED)

Preconditions: Order exists in PLACED status; cashier account available
Steps:
1) Open order details
2) Tap Reject
3) Enter/select reject reason
4) Submit
Expected: Order becomes CANCELLED by RESTAURANT; reason displayed to customer; audit/status history recorded

Description: Cashier updates status: CONFIRMED → PREPARING → READY
Steps: 1) Open order details\n2) Set status to PREPARING\n3) Set status to READY
Expected: Status transitions succeed in correct sequence; customer tracking reflects PREPARING then READY; timestamps captured

Preconditions: Order status is READY; customer arrives for pickup
Steps: 1) Cashier confirms payment at counter\n2) Mark order as COMPLETED
Expected: Order status becomes COMPLETED; Payment record reflects PAID (if modeled); customer sees completed status

Preconditions: Restaurant has past and future time values (or simulate time)
Steps: 1) Open Pickup Time selection\n2) Try selecting a past time (if shown)
Expected: Past slots are not shown OR selection is prevented with message

Preconditions: Capacity rule enabled OR slot temporarily becomes unavailable
Steps: 1) Open Pickup Time selection\n2) Select a full slot (or simulate full)\n3) Try to place order
Expected: System prevents selection/placement and prompts user to choose another slot

Description: Handle item becomes unavailable at checkout
Preconditions: Cart contains an item that is set unavailable before placing order
Steps: 1) Add item to cart\n2) Cashier toggles item unavailable (or simulate)\n3) Customer places order
Expected: System blocks submission or removes item and prompts customer to adjust cart; no invalid order created
